page.title: 12VILLAGE TRUST IN CORBRIDGE
page.content: The Corbridge Village Trust was inaugurated in January 1965 with the aim or preserving the character and nature of Corbridge and improving the appearance of subsequent developments in and around the village.It also aims to maintain the local tradition and architecture of buildings in the conservation area.The Trust fosters interest in the village and surrounding area providing informative booklets and arranging public "chats" and exhibitions.Finally ,it hopes to maintain a village environment which not only the residents but the tourists will enjoy and appreciate.
